title: Is Artificial Intelligence the Next Maximal Gain? How UAE Emirates Is Betting on ‘Big Data’
content:
A.I. has been creeping into pro cycling for years. Tadej Pogačar's team is taking it a step further: 'A.I. analysis could reveal anything.'

Read the full article at Is Artificial Intelligence the Next Maximal Gain? How UAE Emirates Is Betting on ‘Big Data’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
